meanings.definition: Fails to hit or make contact with something.
meanings.sent1: The baseball player misses the ball during practice.
meanings.sent2: She often misses the target when throwing darts.
meanings.sent3: The cat misses the mouse, but catches it in the end.
meanings.sent4: His aim is so bad, he always misses the mark.
meanings.sent5: The student misses the bus, running after it in vain.

meanings.definition: A title used before a woman's surname or full name to address or refer to her when she is married.
meanings.sent1: Mrs. Smith is the new teacher at school.
meanings.sent2: The misses of the house welcomed the guests with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The misses of the town organized a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The misses attended the meeting with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The misses received a bouquet of flowers from her husband.
